dialog.Name: cdCWnd
dialog.uiControl: % Open cascade control system analysis window cdCAnalysisWnd();
% Open window to load data cdCLoadDataWnd();
% Open window to load simaltion parameters cdCSimParamWnd();

% % Clear simulation window %
% limpio la ventana con las simulaciones cla(cdCWnd.simulationCCD_image) % refresh();
